line: listen do you guys think i have a chance with janine
honey we have been through this before
she’s made it pretty clear it is not going to happen
well all right then i guess i shouldn’t get to excited about the fact that i just kissed her
oh we kissed it up real nice
so you kissed her so what happened after that
i came over here to tell you guys
so she’s just waiting over there for ya
i’m gonna be really late for dance class
okay i’m all right okay but hey could you just leave your lips
she she kisses better than my mom cooks
i am so glad you said cooks
you have got to tell the post office that you have moved
we are still getting all your bills and stuff
you can throw the rest away
here is that table that i ordered
you got it from pottery barn
does anyone even know what an apothecary is
they kicked me out of there just because i sat on a bed
you took off your pants and climbed under the sheets
yeah she hates all mass produced stuff
she thinks her furniture should have a history a story behind it
well this has story behind it
i mean they had to ship it all the way from the white plains store
it’s gotta be one of a kind
y’know like umm y’know uh what’s that god awful ceramic fruit bowl she has on her counter
i made it of this fruit bowl i found in the garbage
i’m telling if you put that in her apartment you’ll never hear the end of it
i’ll i’ll just tell her it’s an antique apothecary table she doesn’t have to know where it came from
oh look look it says that it holds 300 cds
ahh just like the apothecary tables of yore
so then the farmer says that’s not a cow and you’re not milking it
i am so glad you guys got together chandler and i are always looking for a couple to go out with and now we have one
look at us we’re a couple of couples
i had so much fun tonight and what a great restaurant
and chandler i can’t believe i let you pay for this one
so do you guys gonna come over tomorrow
i’ll make that pasta thing i was telling you about
oh but hey look at least let us bring the wine
how are we gonna get out of that one
i can’t handle two nights in a row with them
what what’s wrong with monica and chandler
i don’t know they’re just a little blah
well y’know he’s blah she’s just she’s very loud for such a small person
uh they’re like my best friends
are you saying we can’t hang out with them
‘cause that would kinda be a problem
of course we can still hang out with them
just y’know not two nights in a row
if you want i’ll sell my friends and use the money to buy you presents
where where did you get it
see i knew i knew you’d get it on the first guess
oh you can just imagine that this is where they kept all the stuff to make their potions
ooh you can almost smell the opium
oh okay see i thought i thought you meant how much was it when it was new y’know like back then
yeah no i mean it was at a flea market so it was y’know it was like a dollar
so it was like one and fifty dollars
ohh okay they gave you the old time pricing
well what period is it from
i bet it has a great story behind it too
like y’know where it was from or
that i know this is from white plains
oh it sounds like such a magical place
phoebe’s gonna be here any second she cannot see this
i got it at pottery barn
and if she sees your table she’s gonna know that i lied to her
i told her ours was an original
i know she says it’s all mass produced nothing is authentic and everyone winds up having the same stuff
so come on she’s gonna be here any second
can we please just cover this up with something
i am not gonna hide it from phoebe ooh although i did get some great pottery barn sheets
oh i forgot they made sheets
i still can’t believe she hates pottery barn
it’s not like she hates you
y’know it’s because she’s a twin
ross she’s not weird she just wants her stuff to be one of a kind
y’know what’s not one of a kind
okay let’s turn out all the lights and we’ll just watch the movie
you wanna know where i got it
he got it a flea market
you bought your sheets at a flea market
ross come on you gotta loosen the purse strings a little
the dinner will be ready in twenty minutes
and here is the bottle of wine for you to bring over tonight
you were also going to buy monica flowers but you couldn’t afford it because you paid dinner last night
thanks but uh actually it’s just gonna be me again tonight
oh she’s uh uh really sick
yeah she’s been in there all day uh high fever a nose problem phlegm
i’m really really sorry about tonight
i don’t know if joey told you i just couldn’t get out of going to this play
that’s funny i saw no phlegm
no no she really is sick
then why why is she going to a play
uh y’know starve a fever go to a play for a cold
why is janine not coming over for dinner
well uh she didn’t want to hang out with you guys two nights in a row
well why does she not want to hang out with us
because she uh she she thinks that you are blah and that you monica are too loud
so she was just pretending to have a good time last night
she was lying to our faces
ugh i can not believe this
i mean who is she to judge us
we could not have been nicer to her
and i am not blah i am a hoot
come on please please you guys don’t don’t be mad
i’m sure she just she just said that stuff because she was nervous and you guys are like my best friends
and it was our first date
no you sh no you said you made that up
i know but don’t you think the sick thing is way better than the play thing
i generally just go with monica’s drunk again
come on you guys come on please please just give her another chance huh
of course we will come on we gotta make dinner
i do not like that woman
hey pheebs could you please not put your feet up on my new old sheet
ross where did you get this
i got it at pottery barn
oh my god phoebe pottery barn has ripped off the design of our antique
oh my god well if they’ve ripped off our table ours must be much more than one and fifty dollars
well this doesn’t even smell like opium
of course not it smells like wine which you spilled
and thanks for wrecking my sheet by the way
oh ross calm down i’ll give you the 80 cents
chandler would you like some more orange juice
so uh what are you guys doing
look come on you guys you said you were gonna try
all right look i came over here to invite you guys to a movie with me and janine
well i’d like to but i’m not sure we have time to go
i don’t know what to do
i really want you guys to get along
just please come to the movie with us
i helped you guys out a lot in the start of your relationship
i helped you guys sneak around for like six months and i looked like an idiot
we didn’t give you any money
you don’t think i know that
see i can’t decide whether it would go better next to the new wicker dining chair the sahara desk or the parker console table
i didn’t know that there was a pottery barn up here
your place looks like page 72 of the catalogue
be careful that is very old
early colonial bird merchants used to bring their birds to market in that
oh i bet this has a great story too
it is a room separating apparatus from colonial times
hmm a lot of this stuff is from colonial times
hey what are some other time periods rachel
yeah no i’m telling you rachel has such a great eye for this stuff
ross y’know if you ever decide you need to redecorate and i think that you should
you should you should ask rachel to help
oh honey he doesn’t need my help
i think he’s ready to get rid of what did you call it
the cheap knock offs and dinosaur junk
since you have such a great sense of what i need uh ooh here’s here’s 60 bucks why don’t you take phoebe down to that colonial flea market of yours and get me some stuff
i don’t i don’t think phoebe really wants to come
pheebs i don’t know what to say
i guess the flea market was just better last time
well at least i got these sheets for ross
there’s the coffee table they stole from us
that fan kinda looks like ours
and the birdcage and the wait a sec
this is our exact living room
i mean we don’t have the we don’t have the that lamp
and and that screen is y’know on the other side
this is where you got all our stuff pottery barn
okay okay look no i did i just wanted this stuff and i know how you feel about pottery barn
just come on don’t be mad
no no no but i am mad
because this stuff is everything that is wrong with the world
and it’s all sitting up in my living room and all i can think about is how i don’t have that lamp
well then honey buy the lamp
hey we have that 60 bucks from ross
unless well are you saying that that you would move out if if i didn’t buy that lamp
but are you saying that you would move out if i didn’t buy that lamp
okay then i don’t have a choice
i have to buy that lamp
but at least the apothecary table is real
well this this this was great
didn’t everybody have a great time
and you guys i’ve got to say i’m sorry if i was a little weird after the last time we went out
i guess i was just nervous or something
so we can go out again
y’know you’re not so quiet yourself missy
listen the only thing more boring than watching modern dance is having to listen to you talk about it oh chandler i just lost myself in the moment
y’know i know you’re talking but all i hear is blah
i i i gotta talk to janine
y’know i think you can take her
you’d better hope i don’t see you in the hallway
all right uh we’ve got a little bit of a problem here
these people are my friends you can’t treat them that way
they said stuff to me too y’know
and i’m going to talk to them about it
they mean so much to me
if you guys are gonna be fighting all the time i i i don’t think we can be together
it just it just can’t work
would would it help if i went over and apologized
what did i tell you about the hall
i was just coming over here to apologize for my behavior
i’d really like it if we could be friends
well i know that would make joey happy so i would like that too
well i’m glad we worked things out
yeah uh what am i gonna do
hey so did uh did she move out
i cannot believe you broke up with her just like that
well when it’s not right you know it
y’know what would cheer you up
i’m giving this lecture on erosion theories tomorrow night i think you should come
